string.name: about_headline
string.description: Headline for the welcome screen.

string.name: about_text
string.description: Text for the welcome screen.

resources.string: Intra protects your DNS queries by routing them over a secure HTTPS connection. This reduces the chance that you will be sent to the wrong site, or have your browsing blocked or observed.

string.name: privacy_text
string.description: Privacy text for the welcome screen.

resources.string: By default, your queries will be routed to Google Public DNS (Privacy Policy). You can also choose to use Cloudflare (Privacy Policy).

string.name: accept
string.description: Button label to exit the welcome screen.

string.name: drawer_open
string.description: Hint for visually impaired users to access the menu.

string.name: drawer_close
string.description: Hint for visually impaired users to leave the menu.

string.name: home
string.description: Menu label to return to the app's main screen.

string.name: settings
string.description: Menu label to access the Settings page.

string.name: privacy_link
string.description: Link to the privacy policy.

string.name: tos_link
string.description: Link to the terms of service.

string.name: source_code
string.description: Link to the source code for this app.

string.name: short_credits_text
string.description: Jigsaw credits. 'Jigsaw' and 'Intra' are not translatable.

resources.string: Intra is an experimental open source project by Jigsaw.

string.name: credits_text
string.description: Credits to contributing parties. 'Jigsaw' and 'Intra' are not translatable.

resources.string: Intra was made by Jigsaw. IP locations are based on data from DB-IP.com.

string.name: dns_on
string.description: This is a large message at the top of the main screen. It says 'Your DNS queries are protected', with the word 'protected' highlighted in a reassuring color.

string.name: dns_off
string.description: This is a large message at the top of the main screen. It says 'Your DNS queries are exposed', with the word 'exposed' highlighted in a scary color.

string.name: enable_protection
string.description: This text appears on a button to enable DNS protection functionality.

string.name: disable_protection
string.description: This text appears on a button to disable DNS protection functionality.

string.name: system_details
string.description: This is the title of a section containing information on the system configuration and status.

string.name: num_requests
string.description: This text appears under the number of queries protected so far.

string.name: queries_per_minute
string.description: This text appears under the number of queries protected in the past minute.

string.name: transport_label
string.description: This text appears under the name of the secure protocol currently in use. Currently, that is always 'https'.

string.name: insecure_transport_label
string.description: This text appears under the name of the insecure protocol currently in use. Currently, that is always 'dns'.

string.name: server_label
string.description: This text appears under the domain name of the secure server currently in use, e.g. 'dns.google.com'.

string.name: insecure_server_label
string.description: This text appears under the name of the insecure server currently in use.

string.name: unknown_server
string.description: This is a placeholder, used when the server address is unknown.

string.name: show_history
string.description: This label appears next to a checkbox. When the box is checked, recent queries will start being shown.

string.name: query_label
string.description: This text appears under the domain name for which a DNS query was issued.

string.name: type_label
string.description: This text appears under the type of query that was issued ('A' or 'AAAA').

string.name: latency_label
string.description: This text appears under a measurement of network latency, like '923 ms'.

string.name: resolver_label
string.description: This text appears under a two-letter ISO country code, indicating the country where the DNS resolver is located.

string.name: destination_label
string.description: This text appears under a two-letter ISO country code, indicating the country where the resolved domain's IP address is located.

string.name: latency_ms
string.description: Template for forming latency strings. Time is in milliseconds.

string.name: server_choice
string.description: Title of the setting to choose your server

string.name: server_choice_summary
string.description: Template for text that appears under the server choice option

string.name: server_choice_custom
string.description: Label for option to type in your own server URL

string.name: server_choice_warning
string.description: Warning shown if the URL is invalid or does not start with https://

resources.string: Custom server must be a valid https:// URL

string.name: excluded_apps
string.description: Title of the 'Excluded apps' setting, which allows the user to select apps that will not use Intra.

string.name: excluded_apps_summary
string.description: Summary of how the Excluded apps' setting works

resources.string: DNS queries from any selected apps will not go through Intra. If an app appears to be incompatible with Intra, you can add it here.

string.name: excluded_apps_title
string.description: Title to appear over the 'Excluded apps' selection list. Must be short.

resources.string: Mark apps to exclude from Intra

string.name: old_android
string.description: Shown when a user-interface element requires a newer OS version

resources.string: This functionality is not available on your version of Android.

string.name: notification_title
string.description: Status indicator text shown in a persistent notification.

string.name: notification_content
string.description: Indicates what will happen if the user taps the notification.

resources.string: Tap to change DNS protection setting

string.name: channel_name
string.description: Description of the notification, as shown in the system's advanced notifications settings page.

resources.string: This notification appears while DNS protection is active.

string.name: warning_title
string.description: Status indicator text shown in a warning notification.

string.name: warning_channel_name
string.description: This is the name of the class of notifications that show warnings. It's only visible in the system's advanced notifications settings page.

string.name: warning_channel_description
string.description: This is the explanatory text describing the 'Warning' notification class. It's only visible in the system's advanced notifications settings page.

resources.string: Shown when Intra has encountered a problem.
